bfcaf982-bbcb-4ebd-b5d5-50048c8c7738.name: Flexibility (Double-Jointed)
bfcaf982-bbcb-4ebd-b5d5-50048c8c7738.notes: May ignore up to -5 in penalties for close quarters

d61c592e-8f3f-406e-b87c-90c2581f86cd.name: Easy to Hit
d61c592e-8f3f-406e-b87c-90c2581f86cd.notes: Others can target your eyes at only -6 to hit

cfb772f8-2035-4ba2-bf46-6b8c40c5f5de.name: Code of Honor (Soldier's)
cfb772f8-2035-4ba2-bf46-6b8c40c5f5de.notes: The Wapawab and loyalty to the creche.

8ebd0a9f-a322-4dbe-b8f4-b70fc1dd839c.name: Honesty
8ebd0a9f-a322-4dbe-b8f4-b70fc1dd839c.notes: Make a self-control roll when faced with the “need” to break unreasonable laws; if you fail, you must obey the law, whatever the consequences. If you manage to resist your urges and break the law, make a second self-control roll afterward. If you fail, you must turn yourself in to the authorities!

01b39e83-a025-4420-b4ec-8b1a79e22266.name: Attentive
01b39e83-a025-4420-b4ec-8b1a79e22266.notes: +1 bonus when working on lengthy tasks, but -3 to notice any important interruption

226ac197-a71a-4065-8c57-830eb8041221.name: Finds comfort and security in complexity.
